info.name: Tiny retrostyle 4 revamped TagesschauDe 4 Desktops
info.description: A quick trial to display tagesschau.de's new style in a way that looks a bit more like the old one.
info.additionalInfo:
Before trying this user-style you may want to have a look at how your system's ClearType (or your systems similar technology's) settings influence your view experience.

This style comes without any guarantee, use at own risk.

There is no link whatsoever between me and tagesschau.de.
